amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. The amount otherwise made available by this Act for "Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide" is hereby reduced by $250,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds made available by this Act for "Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide" by $250,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 39 - 380 (Roll no. 525).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 39 - 380 (Roll no. 525).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Flake.
